item.title: Pipeline Compliance & Documentation
item.author: Author
item.description: 1 Overview 1.1 Indigenous Monitors The Canada Energy Regulator (CER) works to protect the future of the Canadian energy industry by developing projects which engage with Indigenous communities to ensure energy projects operate safely and under the strictest environmental standards. A key participant in this process are the Indigneous Monitors (IM): Quote Indigenous peoples, the Government of Canada, and the CER worked together to create the Indigenous Advisory and Monitoring Committees, or IAMCs.
